endpoints.description: Enable and configure the integration of a renewable energy source into the existing energy grid.
Retrieve real-time production metrics of renewable energy sources.
Fetch the current status and performance metrics of the energy grid interface.
Set up notifications for certain grid or production events.
Obtain predictive analytics for energy demand based on historical and modeling data.
View a summary of energy supply from renewable sources.
Allow utilities to upload external data for modeling and integration.
Update configurations for grid energy distribution settings.
Remove obsolete or inactive renewable resources from the system.
Generate and download custom reports about renewable energy integration and performance.
